languages.text: "Было. Преподобный отец, да будет вам известно, что на корабль Теодоры фон Валанциус совершили нападение противные сердцу любого праведника слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}", {n}— Арджента почти шипит от ярости.{/n} "И не все они встретили заслуженный конец. Часть бежала, и более того — нечестивые речи их явно говорили о том, что это нападение — часть более масштабного замысла".

traits.locale_text: "Было, отче". {n}Голос Ардженты кажется самую малость нервным, но она быстро берет себя в руки.{/n} "Преподобный отец, да будет вам известно, что на корабль Теодоры фон Валанциус совершили нападение противные сердцу любого праведника слуги Хаоса", {n}— Арджента почти шипит от ярости.{/n} "И не все они встретили заслуженный конец. Часть бежала, и более того — нечестивые речи их явно говорили о том, что это нападение — часть более масштабного замысла".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "It was. Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."
languages.original_text: "Было. Преподобный отец, да будет вам известно, что на корабль Теодоры фон Валанциус совершили нападение противные сердцу любого праведника слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}", {n}— Арджента почти шипит от ярости.{/n} "И не все они встретили заслуженный конец. Часть бежала, и более того — нечестивые речи их явно говорили о том, что это нападение — часть более масштабного замысла".

traits.locale_text: "It was, Father." {n}Argenta's voice sounds the least bit nervous, but she quickly gets a hold of herself.{/n} "Father, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of Chaos, appalling to the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It was, Father." {n}Argenta's voice sounds the least bit nervous, but she quickly gets a hold of herself.{/n} "Father, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of Chaos, appalling to the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

traits.locale_text: "It was, Father." {n}Argenta's voice sounds ever so slightly nervous, but she quickly steels herself.{/n} "Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of Chaos, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

traits.locale_text: "It was. Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “确实有收获，牧师。我得告诉你，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的船遭到了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}仆人的袭击，那些人的暴行让每个正义的灵魂都感到震惊不已。”{n}阿洁塔几乎怒不可遏地嘶声说着。{/n}“而且，他们并非所有人都得到了应有的惩罚，有一部分人逃跑了。不止如此，他们亵渎的话语，清楚地表明那起袭击是某个更大的计划的一部分。”
languages.original_text: "It was. Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

traits.locale_text: “确实有收获，牧师。我得告诉你，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的船遭到了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}仆人的袭击，那些人的暴行让每个正义的灵魂都感到震惊不已。”{n}阿洁塔几乎怒不可遏地嘶声说着。{/n}“而且，他们并非所有人都得到了应有的惩罚，有一部分人逃跑了。不止如此，他们亵渎的话语，清楚地表明那起袭击是某个更大的计划的一部分。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Sin duda. Reverendo, ha de saber que la nave de Theodora von Valancius ha sido atacada por sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, seres que horrorizan el corazón de toda alma justa». {n}Informa, iracunda, casi siseando.{/n} «Y no todos ellos recibieron su merecido; algunos huyeron, y hay más: sus palabras blasfemas dejaron entrever que el ataque era parte de un plan mayor».
languages.original_text: "It was. Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda. Reverendo, ha de saber que la nave de Theodora von Valancius ha sido atacada por sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, seres que horrorizan el corazón de toda alma justa». {n}Informa, iracunda, casi siseando.{/n} «Y no todos ellos recibieron su merecido; algunos huyeron, y hay más: sus palabras blasfemas dejaron entrever que el ataque era parte de un plan mayor».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ええ。司祭様、テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの船は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の手下どもに襲われ、正義の心を持つすべての人を驚愕させました」{n}彼女は怒りのあまり、うなるような声で言った。{/n}「そして、犠牲者の多くがふさわしい最後を迎えることができませんでした。逃走したものもいれば、それ以上に恐ろしい最後を迎えた者もいます…彼らの冒涜的な言葉は、この攻撃がより大きな計画の一部に過ぎないということを明確に示していました」
languages.original_text: "It was. Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ。司祭様、テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの船は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の手下どもに襲われ、正義の心を持つすべての人を驚愕させました」{n}彼女は怒りのあまり、うなるような声で言った。{/n}「そして、犠牲者の多くがふさわしい最後を迎えることができませんでした。逃走したものもいれば、それ以上に恐ろしい最後を迎えた者もいます…彼らの冒涜的な言葉は、この攻撃がより大きな計画の一部に過ぎないということを明確に示していました」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Das war sie. Reverend, Ihr sollt wissen, dass Theodora von Valancius' Schiff von Dienern des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeindes{/g} angegriffen wurde, die das Herz jeder rechtschaffenen Seele erzürnen", {n}sagt sie, nahezu zischend vor Wut.{/n} "Und nicht alle von ihnen fanden ein angemessenes Ende. Einige flohen und mehr noch – ihre blasphemischen Worte deuten klar darauf hin, dass dieser Angriff Teil eines größeren Plans war."
languages.original_text: "It was. Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

traits.locale_text: "Das war sie. Reverend, Ihr sollt wissen, dass Theodora von Valancius' Schiff von Dienern der {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeindin{/g} angegriffen wurde, die das Herz jeder rechtschaffenen Seele erzürnen", {n}sagt sie, nahezu zischend vor Wut.{/n} "Und nicht alle von ihnen fanden ein angemessenes Ende. Einige flohen und mehr noch – ihre blasphemischen Worte deuten klar darauf hin, dass dieser Angriff Teil eines größeren Plans war."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui. Révérend, sachez que le vaisseau de Théodora von Valancius a été attaqué par des serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, ces abominations qui révoltent les cœurs de toutes les âmes justes, {n}explique-t-elle dans un sifflement de rage.{/n} Et tous n'ont pas connu la fin qu'ils méritaient. Certains scélérats ont fui. Pire encore, leurs paroles blasphématoires ont clairement montré que cette attaque faisait partie d'un plan plus grand. »
languages.original_text: "It was. Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Révérend, sachez que le vaisseau de Théodora von Valancius a été attaqué par des serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, ces abominations qui révoltent les cœurs de toutes les âmes justes, {n}explique-t-elle dans un sifflement de rage.{/n} Et tous n'ont pas connu la fin qu'ils méritaient. Certains scélérats ont fui. Pire encore, leurs paroles blasphématoires ont clairement montré que cette attaque faisait partie d'un plan plus grand. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Geçti. Theodora von Valancius'un gemisinin, her erdemlinin yüreğine dehşet salabilecek {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} hizmetkârlarının saldırısına uğradığını bildirmek isterim Muhterem." {n}Âdeta öfkeden tıslayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Saldırganların hepsi hak ettiği sona kavuşmadı. Bazıları kaçtı. Daha da mühimi, kâfirce sözleri bu saldırının daha büyük bir tertibin parçası olduğunu işaret ediyordu."
languages.original_text: "It was. Reverend, let it be known to you that Theodora von Valancius's ship was attacked by servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, who appal the heart of any righteous soul," {n}she says, nearly hissing with fury.{/n} "And not all of them met a fitting end. Some fled, and more than that — their blasphemous words clearly pointed to this attack being part of a larger design."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleydi. Muhterem, Theodora von Valancius'un gemisinin, inançlıların kalplerine tesir etme kabiliyeti bulunan {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın hizmetkârlarının saldırısına uğradığını bildirmek isterim." {n}Âdeta öfkeden tıslayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Hak ettikleri sona hepsi kavuşmadı. Bazıları kaçtı ve daha da önemlisi, kâfirce sözleri, bu saldırının daha büyük bir tasarımın bir parçası olduğuna işaret ediyordu."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
